duties_responsibilities.duty: Work directly with strategic vendors to grow their business and optimize supply chain.
Manage cross-functional areas to improve vendor success at Amazon.
Own forecasting, monitoring, and reporting on vendor, and drive strategic supply chain projects.
Conduct pricing, ROI analysis, and negotiate costs for the vendor.
Optimize online presence and content of each product on the brand's portfolio.
Develop and execute marketing plans to drive brand awareness and purchases.
Drive cross-category initiatives to improve operational processes and deliver results.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree, or 3+ years of professional or military experience
